question: Pod manifest with readiness exec probe checking /tmp/ready exists.
suggested_answer:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: app
spec:
  containers:
  - name: busybox
    image: busybox
    command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - touch /tmp/ready; sleep 3600
    readinessProbe:
      exec:
        command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - test -f /tmp/ready
